event.title: Should I switch to Preact?  RomaJS #AperiTech
event.description:
IMPORTANTE: per accedere facilmente agli spazi offerti da EnLabs Ã¨ necessario registrare la propria presenza su: https://www.eventbrite.it/e/biglietti-should-i-switch-to-preact-meetup-aperitech-di-romajs-37527376393

Should I switch to Preact?

Knowledge is important to make right choices. In this talk we will try to analyze how React and Preact works to make a better choice for our users.

Speaker: Guido D'Orsi (@sockhatso)

Building (and maintain!) a styleguide with React

React Storybook is a powerful tool that helps teams to build and maintain components style guide documented and in sync with the application.

Speaker: Matteo Manchi (@matteomanchi)
